alert.note: Alert for Upper Hood River Valley (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 10 at 3:09AM PST until December 10 at 12:00PM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON PST TODAY... ...WINTER STORM WARNING IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations 1 to 4 inches. * WHERE...Upper Hood River Valley. * WHEN...Until noon PST today. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow level on the valley floor early, but will rising today, up to 1500 feet by later this morning.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1, or visit for Oregon: https://www.tripcheck.com and for Washington: https://wsdot.com/travel/real-time/map
